titleStmt.title: Testamen[t] y dauddeg Padriarch meibion Jacob ...
Testaments of the twelve patriarchs. Welsh.
titleStmt.author: Grosseteste, Robert, 1175?-1253.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn, worn, cropped, tightly bound, and faded, with loss of text. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
